text: Manavare, nim'mannu onde jivadinda srstisida nim'ma odeyanige nistharagiri. Avanu ade jivadinda adara joteyannu srstisidanu mattu avaribbara mulaka anekaru purusarannu striyarannu (lokadalli) habbidanu. Yava allahana hesaralli nivu hakkugalannu keluttiro avanige sada anjiri mattu bandhavyagalannu kapadiri. Khanditavagiyu allahanu nim'ma mele sada kannittiruttane
